name: Welcome to IIITD
description: We all know, we are succumbed to great pressure here in IIITD due to the heavy workload and deadlines and can’t enjoy our college life to the fullest. But now IT’S OUR TIME !! Via this game “WELCOME TO IIITD” you can simply try to elude from all the heavy workload and enjoy your life by visiting cafes and restaurants inside the campus and do light weight assignments. Just be careful that you don’t get caught by the cunning, angry PROFS
